I have a simple managed project: with one Class Sun: declaration in Sun.h and 
definition in Sun.cpp.
main.cpp looks like this:

#include "Sun.h"
int main(String argc, String argv[]) {
Sun s;
return 0;
}

search on all types all occurrences of Sun returns empty list (or a navigable 
list of invisible search results) even though the title bar of the search view 
indicates 5 occurences are found. The workaround is to reset perspective.
